The stage is set for tomorrow’s job fair in Rock Hill. 30+ companies looking to fill hundreds of jobs!

10 AM to 2 PM at the Cherry Park Elementary School.  Details:

 http://www.JobFairSC.com

I'm oversimplifying this, but @Arkema_Inc produces chemical additives to help improve the quality and shelf life of materials like paint and polyurethane.  Thank you all for your hospitality! https://twitter.com/Arkema_Inc/status/1134172211441541120 …

Thank you for having me!  Details on Saturday’s job fair online at:

 http://www.JobFairSC.com  https://twitter.com/WRHI/status/1134068034568695810 …

I'm heading to the @WRHI studio right now to talk about the job fair I'm hosting this Saturday for York, Chester, and Lancaster counties.  FM 100.7 around Rock Hill or listen online at  http://wrhi.com 

Details for the job fair:  http://JobFairSC.com

28+ companies from York, Chester, and Lancaster counties will be ready to hire THIS SATURDAY.

If you or someone you know is looking for a job, don't miss this job fair in Rock Hill from 10 AM until 2 PM!

Details:  http://www.JobFairSC.com

Several great topics to unpack with Keven Cohen in a few minutes.  I'll be live with him at 4:05 PM on the Afternoon Drive.

Phrases like "Happy Memorial Day" are improper. We don't celebrate this day.

Instead, we OBSERVE #MemoriaDay. We honor those men and women who gave their lives to defend and protect this country. And we thank God for every single one of them.

#RememberTheirSacrifice pic.twitter.com/G2EbJPvn2t

“Whatever food you and your family may need... it’s yours to take. No questions asked.”

They’re doing God’s work at The Community Cafe, a non-profit serving free, nutritious meals to those in need throughout York County.

Without incident or injury, I would add. Everyone walked away unscathed!

Current law places an unfair financial  burden on Medicare beneficiaries when a polyp is found during a routine screening.

This law would fix that, and I hope it will have bipartisan support. https://twitter.com/Acscansc/status/1131676996625489920 …
Congratulations to Sheriff Tolson! https://twitter.com/YCSO_SC/status/1131564746589835264 …

As I’ve said repeatedly, and as I’ve told several members of your organization directly, we cannot -allow those with pre-existing conditions to fall by the wayside. I’d like to see well-managed pools to subsidize their coverage, but am open to other solutions as well.

Confirmed: 5 months in the Majority and #HouseDemocrats have delivered a "whirlwind of energy" - No word yet on policy solutions. #somuchenergy https://twitter.com/SpeakerPelosi/status/1131213236286754818 …

No one in #Congress has done more to recruit women to the cause of liberty than my office neighbor Congresswoman Stefanik. As we celebrate women's suffrage, Republicans should also recognize the incredible @RepStefanik for her support of #GOPWomen https://twitter.com/RepStefanik/status/1130910169133662210 …

The yellow rose is the symbol of a wonderful anniversary: On this day 100 years ago the House passed the #19thAmendment which would finally allow women the vote in America. I am proud to witness the record number of women employed and in Congress - let's keep going!#WomensVote100 pic.twitter.com/Qx8XYNN7Gj

It was a pleasure to see and share the stage with you @PamelaEvette. Really admire your leadership and the great things you're accomplishing for our state #PalmettoPride https://twitter.com/PamelaEvette/status/1130850057064869889 …
(5/5) Any president would be frustrated by such sabotage, which is why #AGBarr is right to get to the bottom of how this was allowed, so it will never happen again.
(4/5) Reflected in those allegations, is @realdonaldtrump 's clear and understandable frustration with a system trying to ignore his electoral mandate and take him down from the inside
(3/5) The so-called “evidence” is a collage of unsupported allegations - mostly by disgruntled former employees with an axe to grind
(2/5) What I have read, is a #report that finds no proof of obstruction and no underlying crime to obstruct..
I know my colleague @justinamash to be a conscientious and principled man, but I am baffled by his conclusions about the #Mueller report. It is like we have read two different documents.. (1/5)
